text: Aur Allah ki nishaniyon mein se ek yeh hai ke tum dekhte ho zameen sooni (barren) padi hui hai, phir joon-hi ke humne uspar paani barsaya, yakayak woh phabak uthti hai aur phool jaati hai (quivers and wells).Yakeenan jo khuda is mari (dead) hui zameen ko jila(zinda) uthata hai woh murdon ko bhi zindagi bakshne wala hai.Yaqeenan woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai
